This tests if the SuggestBox works properly.

Testing that the first item is selected.
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: First

Testing that no item is selected.
No item selected.

Testing that highest priority item is selected.
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: The best suggestion

Testing that arrow keys can be used for selection.
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: Hello
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: First
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: The best suggestion
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: First
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: Hello

Testing that enter can be used to accept a suggestion.
Suggestion Applied: Hello
Suggestion accepted

Testing that highest priority item is selected.
No item selected.
Intermediate Suggestion Applied: The best suggestion
